description:
Admiral Wagenseil`s fleet was to form part of the middle section of Kaiser Reinhard`s fleet deployment in http://anidb.net/e12097 [Operation Ragnarok II], along with the http://anidb.net/ch1358 [Grotewohl], http://anidb.net/ch1359 [Meivoher] and http://anidb.net/ch1360 [Kurlich] fleets.
He was later thoroughly outwitted by Julian in a http://anidb.net/e12129 [skirmish] on the Imperial end of the Iserlohn Corridor
name: Wagenseil
